sentences.en: A large green awning is set over the glass window to shelter against the sun.
sentences.cn: 在玻璃窗上装了个绿色的大遮棚以遮挡阳光.

sentences.en: A pleasure - boat with striped awning was going by.
sentences.cn: 一艘装着条纹布篷的游艇正巧经过这里.

sentences.en: At the Motosumiyoshi commuter-train station in Kawasaki, a suburb of Tokyo, sleek solar panels serve as an awning over the platform.
sentences.cn: 在东京郊区川崎的元住吉通勤列车站，平滑的太阳能电池板在月台上被用作遮阳篷和雨篷。

sentences.en: Feature: European groove , outside - swing, hinges, casement, awning and fixed windows.
sentences.cn: 特点: 欧标槽口设计, 外开, 上悬, 固定.

sentences.en: He moved out from beneath an awning, reaching for something inside the breast of his overcoat.
sentences.cn: 他离开遮阳篷，手伸进大衣前胸部找东西。

sentences.en: I bought an awning to go over the doorway.
sentences.cn: 我买了一张可以放在门上的帆布遮篷.

sentences.en: Karen followed the pair onto the patio and watched as they settled at a round table under a burgundy window awning.
sentences.cn: 凯伦跟随这两个人来到庭院，看着他们在一个酒红色遮阳篷下的圆桌旁坐下。

sentences.en: My girlfriend has a blue awning on her house.
sentences.cn: 我的女友的房子上有一顶蓝色的雨篷.

sentences.en: My mind's eye, peeping window, backs off , fluttering under the awning.
sentences.cn: 我的灵目透过窗缝偷窥, 退后, 翩跹于遮阳棚下.

sentences.en: One evening, we sat talking very friendly together under an awning.
sentences.cn: 一天黄昏的时候, 我们在布篷下很和谐地一块儿坐着聊天.

sentences.en: Several people herded under an awning to get out the shower.
sentences.cn: 几个人聚集在门栅下避阵雨.

sentences.en: That evening, the awning fixed over the front cabin , he fiddled while Wuduo and Seven sang.
sentences.cn: 到了晚上, 前舱盖了篷, 男子拉琴,五多唱歌,老七也唱歌.

sentences.en: The awning extends several feet over the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 这个遮阳蓬盖住了人行道上好几英尺的地方.

sentences.en: The front wall of the awning can also be completely folded back.
sentences.cn: 遮阳篷的前墙也可以完全对叠起来.

sentences.en: This rock sticks out; The awning extends several feet over the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 这块岩石伸出来了; 遮阳蓬伸出几个脚在人行道上.

sentences.en: To cover ( a vehicle ) with a canopy or an awning.
sentences.cn: 用帐篷遮盖用顶篷或凉篷遮盖 ( 交通工具 )

trans.tran_cn: 布做的凉篷，遮篷，雨篷，（甲板等上的）天篷
trans.tran_en: a sheet of material outside a shop, tent etc to keep off the sun or the rain
